item.title: "I'm Proud Of What I've Been Able To Do With The Character:" Elizabeth Olsen Addresses Why She Joined The MCU & Why She Avoids Taking Roles Similar To Scarlet Witch
item.description: 3 years after her last MCU appearance, Elizabeth Olsen gets candid about why she chose to play Wanda and why she won't take on another superhero role.

item.title: Marvel's Avengers: Doomsday Announcement Set Up The BIGGEST Comic Book Love Triangle
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday may have just revealed an adaptation of the biggest love triangle in comic book history thanks to the cast reveal announcement.

item.title: Robert De Niro & Al Pacino's Classic Thriller Is Now On Netflix, Right As Sequel Talk Heats Up
item.description: Michael Mann's Heat has arrived on Netflix, and now is the perfect, if bittersweet, time to revisit the film that inspired so many action thrillers.
